title: The.Wolf.Among.Us.Episode.1-4-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
  
                                                                       
                        The Wolf Among Us : Episode 1-4 

    Release Date :  4/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action 

      
  From the makers of the 2012 Game of the Year: The Walking Dead, comes
  a gritty, violent and mature thriller based on the award-winning
  Fables comic books (DC Comics/Vertigo). 

  The Wolf Among Us will be a prequel to the comic book Fables 
  (which emit DC   Vertigo) and will consist of several parts. 
  In the world of games and comic characters known fairy tales 
  have been transferred in a gloomy New York, where they had 
  perforce to settle down in a harsh society people. The protagonist 
  of The Wolf Among Us will be BIGBUY Wolf (Bigby Wolf - ie, Big Bad 
  Wolf, Angry gray wolf classic fairy tales of Little Red Riding Hood 
  and the Three Little Pigs), which is now a hardened detective in New York.   
  Although Wolfe is the human form, it lives inside a bloodthirsty beast, 
  whose detective have to restrain.

    Episode 1: Faith / Belief
    Episode 2: Smoke and Mirrors
    Episode 3: A Crooked Mile 
    Episode 4: In Sheep's Clothing 

     
   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup and install the Game
   - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
   - Play
